page.title: 15All Saints Church,Oval,Stev.
page.content: This excites people because it is shared by{Catholics,Anglicans}and {Methodist};it is only 10 years old.The {Reverend Purvis}told us it is shaped like an arrow,pointing to{God}however you worship.The special cross is in four pieces with little gaps between them to show that although the church is shared,each group worships differently.It is very modern with a nice browny carpet,not like{St. {Nicholas Church}which is tiled.There are lots of fresh flowers and some candles to remind us of{God's gifts. There is a{font}like all churches for christening people but this one is in front by the{altar}where everyone can watch the service.It is metal and can be moved about.There is a special {entrance for brides and coffins.}A {special organ}or an old piano can provide music.
